text: A pleasant life truly!.. It so happens that I have an Italian who is perhaps the best Valet de Chambre that ever was.But he has not one word of English.'While he was writing this letter he heard of the fall of the Whigs, and the temporary assumption of the government by the Duke of Wellington. A peasant life truly!. It so happens that I have.

name: Mathipy Tranfe
